hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #2# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Green Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: Did you know that Barinade, Volvagia and Twinrova hard require the Boomerang, Megaton Hammer and Mirror Shield, respectively?

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Double Defense#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Invisible Enemies Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Slingshot#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #4# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: What do you call a group of Gorons?^${12 39 C7}A rock band.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of #gold#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Three things are certain: death, taxes, and forgetting a check.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #the Gerudo Card# and #a Wallet#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Fire Temple Compass# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Potion Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Raised Island Courtyard Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Farore's Wind# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Heart Container#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Slingshot#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
